course_name: Law of the World Trade Organization
description: An examination of the regulation of international trade by member states of the World Trade Organization, including trade in goods and services, investment, intellectual property and dispute settlement.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(16), LLM(24), MICLaw(16), MIL and MIR/MIL
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
